body_html: We are not going to fix this behavior. The reason is that there are two relevant scopes: the scope that the variable was created in, and the scope that the EMA was created in. There will be potential ambiguity if one is removed. Since removing the duplication isn't clearly better, we're going to keep this behavior.

body: We are not going to fix this behavior. The reason is that there are two relevant scopes: the scope that the variable was created in, and the scope that the EMA was created in. There will be potential ambiguity if one is removed. Since removing the duplication isn't clearly better, we're going to keep this behavior.
